My b.  That cinevia trick does work but it was missing a step.

Copy the movie to the PS3
Disable the internet
Play movie until DRM message then pause
Go to Settings, Date/Time and change date ahead
Repeat as necessary throughout the movie

Nobody picks locks right, nobody jacks cars right, people fly when they get shot, guns have zero recoil, people survive massive injuries, people die from minor injuries, etc etc etc etc and on and on and on. In Running Scared, the main guy took a fucking HOCKEY PUCK to the forehead! What did it do? Put a little cut on his head. Realism is non-existent. So is originality. Pisses me off whenever I figure out a movie I watched was done 30 years ago. *Blah blah blah bitch bitch bitch*
